title: Finding this leavebuster shocking
body:
The only time I ever get disconnected from games is when my client is crashing which happens now and then. Since it's something I can not control I find it daft you can get put in low priority queues for it, shouldn't be punished for something that's out of your hands I even reconnected 3 times and seen the game come to a close. 

Anyone have a suggestion to solve this?

replies.body:
I have been having the same issues :C its only gotten worse.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

When having the problem continuously the client went through numerous repairs but the same problem would happen. After uninstalling it and reinstalling it has happened a lot less, I would presume this being a corrupted file that the client can't self repair.
